trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection> refers to the `sessionPageState` section of the configuration file.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection> can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.Everywhere>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection>可以讀取和寫入資訊的相關區段的組態檔區段屬性根據<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其實<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.Everywhere>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection> object from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection>從現有的 Web 應用程式相關聯的組態檔的物件。
建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Defines the size of the page history.

The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection.DefaultHistorySize> property from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SessionPageStateSection.DefaultHistorySize>從現有的 Web 應用程式相關聯的組態檔的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the page history.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面記錄的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page history.
